name: Maddening Euphoria
description: A unique, challenging, unnecessarily colourful arcade game with randomly generated circular level design and a wall of death.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible or integrated sound chip Additional Notes: Screen resolution minimum 960x540
